title: [Large-Scale] LMS-Based e-Learning User Experience Optimization and Learning Outcome Improvement Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage skills and experience with online learning
context.additional_context: Requires effective e-learning operation strategies in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments, emphasizing task relevance for in-service professionals

learning_goals: Learners can explain three user experience (UX) evaluation criteria in the LMS interface.
Learners can apply at least two principles of designing learning content optimized for mobile environments.
Learners can construct a survey tool to measure e-learning effectiveness using mixed research methods (quantitative + qualitative).
Learners can derive at least one learning performance improvement strategy through LMS data analysis.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
